instruction:
Choose Spotify playlists that match the given mood. Provide a link to these playlists for easy access.

Feeling Good
output:
If you're looking for a playlist to match the mood of feeling good, there are several great options available on Spotify. Here are a few that you might enjoy:

1. Happy Hits: This playlist is filled with upbeat and catchy songs that are sure to put a smile on your face. It includes hits from various genres like pop, rock, and hip-hop. You can find it here: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2u9fZcZwZaKp5gJx3aqmKp

2. Feel-Good Indie Folk: This playlist is perfect for those who prefer a more laid-back, acoustic sound. It features uplifting and heartwarming songs from independent artists in the folk genre. Access it here: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6pZzgZLQX5KcK6Q5ZzUzoz

3. Pop Rewritten: This playlist offers a modern take on pop music, with upbeat and energetic tracks that are sure to make you feel good. You can find it here: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2aPpqzEZaKxZaQo5wZZaPx

4. Workout Motivation: Although this playlist is designed for workout sessions, its high-energy songs can also boost your mood and make you feel good. It includes various genres like pop, rock, and electronic music. Access it here: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/0lMJzgVVgXaQ6oOYNiSyTi

5. Acoustic Happiness: This playlist features acoustic versions of popular songs, offering a more relaxed and uplifting vibe. You can find it here: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/7pZzgZLQX5KcK6Q5ZzUzoz

Remember, music is a personal preference, so you might need to explore these playlists and add or remove songs based on your individual taste. Enjoy!
